Detailed Description

A Solar System (contains a primary star, several planets, and a dust cloud).

Librairie de génération d'un système planétaire réaliste à partir d'informations sur l'étoile primaire (cad centrale) du système.

This function generate the planets of our solar System around the given star.

Creation of the 10 planets of the Sol-System

void SG_SolarSystem::generateSystem (  SG_String  filename  ) 
 

This function generate a planetary system around the primary star.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file to generate (".xml" or ".txt")

void SG_SolarSystem::setStarLuminosity (  long  luminosity = 1  ) 
 

Set some data about the primary star: Luminosity.

Parameters:
luminosity The luminosity of the star (unit = Solar Luminosity). The value RANDOM can also be used. If the data is not defined, the default value is the Sun luminosity (=1)

void SG_SolarSystem::setStarMass (  long  mass = 1  ) 
 

Set some data about the primary star: Mass.

Parameters:
mass the mass of the star (unit = Solar Mass). The value RANDOM can also be used. If the data is not defined, the defalut value is the Sun mass (=1)
